channel.title: Modelling Ecology & Evolution Zurich
channel.description: MEEZ is a modelling seminar for junior researchers in Ecology & Evolutionary Biology

item.title: Important dates
item.description:
• January 15, 2019: Call for abstracts
  • March 15, 2019: Abstract submission deadline
  • March 29, 2019: Decision on abstracts & registration open
  • May 3, 2019: Registration deadline
